summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 102 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (down 0.4 mm), cloud levels (up 1689 m), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), and outside temperature (up 2.7°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and little or no wind. Possible light showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and it’s dark. Changeable conditions.
